languages.text: Великолепный предмет одежды, демонстрирующий, сколь велика пропасть между его обладателем и измазанными грязью серфами. Именно такую вещь должен носить настоящий хладный торговец — любимец удачи и богач на миг, в любую секунду рискующий оказаться на виселице.

This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.
languages.original_text: Великолепный предмет одежды, демонстрирующий, сколь велика пропасть между его обладателем и измазанными грязью серфами. Именно такую вещь должен носить настоящий хладный торговец — любимец удачи и богач на миг, в любую секунду рискующий оказаться на виселице.

traits.locale_text: This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

languages.text: Ce fabuleux vêtement témoigne de l'immense fossé qui sépare la personne qui le porte des serfs crasseux. Il sied à merveille aux adeptes du Commerce Froid qui ont la chance de leur côté et courent perpétuellement le risque d'être envoyés à la potence.
languages.original_text: This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

traits.locale_text: Ce fabuleux vêtement témoigne de l'immense fossé qui sépare la personne qui le porte des serfs crasseux. Il sied à merveille aux adeptes du Commerce Froid qui ont la chance de leur côté et courent perpétuellement le risque d'être envoyés à la potence.

languages.text: Esta fabulosa prenda muestra la magnitud de la distancia que separa a su portador del mugriento populacho. Es ideal para cualquier Comerciante Frío que goce del favor de la voluble fortuna, corriendo el riesgo de acabar en el patíbulo cualquier día.
languages.original_text: This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

traits.locale_text: Esta fabulosa prenda muestra la magnitud de la distancia que separa a su portador del mugriento populacho. Es ideal para cualquier Comerciante Frío que goce del favor de la voluble fortuna, corriendo el riesgo de acabar en el patíbulo cualquier día.

languages.text: この素晴らしい衣服は、これを身に着けていた者と、汚物まみれの農奴との計り知れない格差を物語っている。気まぐれな幸運に愛でられ、絞首台に送られる危険を常に抱えて生きる、真のコールド・トレーダーにぴったりの一品。
languages.original_text: This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

traits.locale_text: この素晴らしい衣服は、これを身に着けていた者と、汚物まみれの農奴との計り知れない格差を物語っている。気まぐれな幸運に愛でられ、絞首台に送られる危険を常に抱えて生きる、真のコールド・トレーダーにぴったりの一品。

languages.text: 这件精美绝伦的衣物展示了它的主人与肮脏的农奴之间无法逾越的巨大鸿沟。对那些得到无常命运青睐，而又随时可能会被送上绞刑架的冷市商人而言，这绝对是最合适的装束。
languages.original_text: This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

traits.locale_text: 这件精美绝伦的衣物展示了它的主人与肮脏的农奴之间无法逾越的巨大鸿沟。对那些得到无常命运青睐，而又随时可能会被送上绞刑架的冷市商人而言，这绝对是最合适的装束。

languages.text: Dieses fabelhafte Kleidungsstück demonstriert eindrucksvoll, wie gewaltig die Kluft zwischen seinem Träger und dem schmutzigen Pöbel ist. Der perfekte Schnitt für jeden wahren Kalthändler, der vom Schicksal geküsst wurde und doch mit der ständigen Gefahr lebt, am Galgen zu landen.
languages.original_text: This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

traits.locale_text: Dieses fabelhafte Kleidungsstück demonstriert eindrucksvoll, wie gewaltig die Kluft zwischen seinem Träger und dem schmutzigen Pöbel ist. Der perfekte Schnitt für jeden wahren Kalthändler, der vom Schicksal geküsst wurde und doch mit der ständigen Gefahr lebt, am Galgen zu landen.

languages.text: Bu harikulade kıyafet, onu giyen kişi ile pis kokulu köleler arasındaki ayrımın büyüklüğünü ortaya koyuyor. Başlarına talih kuşu konmuş ve her daim darağacına yollanma tehlikesi bulunan Soğuk Tacirler için mükemmel bir seçim.
languages.original_text: This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

traits.locale_text: Bu harikulade giyim eşyası, onu giyen kişi ile pis kokulu kölelerin arasındaki ayrımın büyüklüğünü ortaya koyuyor. Başlarına talih kuşu konmuş ve her daim darağacına yollanma tehlikeleri bulunan Soğuk Tacirler için mükemmel bir seçim.
